UniprotID	Q8WXD2-2
Accession	Q8WXD2;A8K2B0;B3KQP6;B4DK99;F5H3R8;Q96C83;Q96GE8;Q9Y6G7
EntryName	SCG3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Secretogranin-3 (Secretogranin III) (SgIII)
GeneName	SCG3 UNQ2502/PRO5990
Length	236
Function	Member of the granin protein family that regulates the biogenesis of secretory granules (PubMed:19357184). Acts as a sorting receptor for intragranular proteins including chromogranin A/CHGA (By similarity). May also play a role in angiogenesis. Promotes endothelial proliferation, migration and tube formation through MEK/ERK signaling pathway (PubMed:29154827).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle membrane; Secreted
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy	
Polar
